channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenMage -- magento-lts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenMage -- magento-lts

item.title: CVE-2023-23617|2024-08-02T10:35:33.617Z -- openmage -- magento-lts
item.description: OpenMage LTS is an e-commerce platform. Versions prior to 19.4.22 and 20.0.19 contain an infinite loop in malicious code filter in certain conditions. Versions 19.4.22 and 20.0.19 have a fix for this issue. There are no known workarounds.

item.title: CVE-2023-41879|2024-08-02T19:09:49.294Z -- openmage -- magento-lts
item.description: Magento LTS is the official OpenMage LTS codebase. Guest orders may be viewed without authentication using a "guest-view" cookie which contains the order's "protect_code". This code is 6 hexadecimal characters which is arguably not enough to prevent a brute-force attack. Exposing each order would require a separate brute force attack. This issue has been patched in versions 19.5.1 and 20.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-41676|2024-08-02T04:46:52.910Z -- openmage -- magento-lts
item.description: Magento-lts is a long-term support alternative to Magento Community Edition (CE). This XSS vulnerability affects the design/header/welcome, design/header/logo_src, design/header/logo_src_small, and design/header/logo_alt system configs.They are intended to enable admins to set a text in the two cases, and to define an image url for the other two cases. But because of previously missing escaping allowed to input arbitrary html and as a consequence also arbitrary JavaScript. The problem is patched with Version 20.10.1 or higher.

item.title: CVE-2024-41676|2024-07-29T14:46:26.806Z -- openmage -- magento-lts
item.description: Magento-lts is a long-term support alternative to Magento Community Edition (CE). But because of previously missing escaping allowed to input arbitrary html and as a consequence also arbitrary JavaScript. The problem is patched with Version 20.10.1 or higher.
